original_title: ชีวิต...เดียว
overview: One will know the value of what he has when he lost it. The same as Deaw, a desperate 25 years of age young man, who is weak and gives up to the obstruction and trouble. In the second he decides to commit suicide, miracle happens and teaches him to learn about the human value. His life changes because of two girls, Aor and Pan.
title: My Wonderful Life
